messages.subject: Re: Managing e-mail
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/2/99 7:48:18 AM, jalecroy@InfoAve.Net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/2/99 7:48:18 AM, jalecroy@... writes:

<< If I see a post which I would like
to read again/ponder, or one to which I want to respond, I drag them
into one of two folders I created: "To Read" or "To Reply."

It works for me!

Denise, South Carolina
>>

oh, thank you! just this simple tip will help me, i had titled my folders by
subject and i can see now that your method will be much more helpful!! i
have never been a natural for organization, so love the help :)
erin

messages.subject: Managing e-mail
messages.msgSnippet: I babysit my 7-mo grandson and unschool our 16-yo daughter. I subscribe to about seven lists, all but one in digest form. Digests are a lifesaver, IMHO. I read
messages.messageBody:
I babysit my 7-mo grandson and unschool our 16-yo daughter. I subscribe
to about seven lists, all but one in digest form.

Digests are a lifesaver, IMHO. I read through them every morning with a
cup of tea (this is essential LOL). If I see a post which I would like
to read again/ponder, or one to which I want to respond, I drag them
into one of two folders I created: "To Read" or "To Reply."

It works for me!

Denise, South Carolina
